sentences: Alf Wills said the future should involve a strengthened Kyoto Protocol that includes all countries and recognizes their common but differentiated responsibilities.

He stressed that the science of adaptation is relatively underdeveloped, highlighted that mitigation and adaptation in South Africa is an 'energy story,' and called for a 'roadmap' for negotiations to be developed at COP-11/MOP-1 in Montreal in late 2005.
